# Quentin Rousseau's Blog

> Personal technical blog by Quentin Rousseau â€” CTO & Co-founder at Rootly (YC S21). Topics include SRE, infrastructure, AI-assisted development, incident management, and startup engineering.

## About the Author

Quentin Rousseau is the CTO, CISO & Co-founder of Rootly, an AI-native incident management platform used by teams at NVIDIA, Squarespace, Canva, and Figma. Previously an early SRE at Instacart and co-founder of PopSQL (YC S19). Based in San Francisco, originally from France.

- Website: https://blog.quent.in
- GitHub: https://github.com/kwent
- X: https://x.com/quentinrousseau
- LinkedIn: https://linkedin.com/in/quentinrousseau
- Company: https://rootly.com
